title: How to Tell if an Older Woman Likes You

steps.title: Women often flirt with eye contact.
steps.content: Women often flirt with eye contact. She might look at you, look away, and look back. Or, she may lock eyes with you for a few seconds. [1] X Research source Show her you’re into her by catching her gaze and flashing her a big smile.

steps.title: Women flirt by playing with their hair and wetting their lips.
steps.content: Women flirt by playing with their hair and wetting their lips. She may even stare at your lips like she wants to kiss you. [2] X Research source When you see this, wink at her to flirt back , because there's a good chance she’s into you. Gently brush against her. Ask her a question to start a conversation. Offer to buy her a drink.

steps.title: Breaking the touch barrier is a classic way to flirt.
steps.content: Breaking the touch barrier is a classic way to flirt. She might do things like bump into you, lean against you, or touch your arm because she wants you. Mirror her movements so she knows you want her, too. [3] X Research source You might even follow her lead and touch her back. Sit close to her so your legs touch. Lightly touch her arm to emphasize a point while talking. Brush your hand against her thigh.

steps.title: She'll ask your dating age range to see if you'd date her.
steps.content: She'll ask your dating age range to see if you'd date her. Reassure her that you’re interested by telling her age is just a number. Who knows—you might land yourself a date . [4] X Research source “I date people of all ages.” “Age doesn’t really matter to me.”

steps.title: She'll tell you she's single so you know she’s available.
steps.content: She'll tell you she's single so you know she’s available. When an older woman brings up her relationship status, she’s usually trying to send you a message. In this case, that message says, “I like you, so come and get it.” Tell her that you’re single, too. [5] X Research source How to Tell if an Older Woman Likes You “I totally understand. I’m single, too.” “Same here. My last few dates just haven’t been what I’m looking for.” “Yeah, I’m not seeing anyone either.”

steps.title: Older women aren’t shy about flirting over text.
steps.content: Older women aren’t shy about flirting over text. She knows what she wants, and she’s not going to waste time with vague hints. She’ll make her intentions toward you known with sexual innuendo, sultry pics, and dirty jokes. Send her back a flirty text to show her you’re interested. [6] X Research source “Well, aren’t you naughty😉” “You’re so hot 🔥” “😏 Looking good”

steps.title: She'll text you late because you’re on her mind.
steps.content: She'll text you late because you’re on her mind. Show her you’re thinking about her, too. Ask her a question to keep the conversation going and flirt over text . [7] X Research source “I’m just relaxing. What are you doing?” “Looks like I’m not the only one up. Something on your mind?” “Hey, how’s your night going?”

steps.title: She’ll ask about dating because she wants to be your next lady love.
steps.content: She’ll ask about dating because she wants to be your next lady love. Mention that your last relationship ended, but you’re open to starting something new and are looking for romance. Hopefully, she’ll take the hint. [8] X Research source “My last relationship ended a few months ago, so I’m exploring my options. How about you?” “I’ve been on a few dates lately, but nothing serious yet. How’s your dating life?”

steps.title: She wants to be around you because she’s into you.
steps.content: She wants to be around you because she’s into you. She’ll be eager to see you, so she’ll invite you out, make group plans with you, or show up at places you frequent. To show her you’re interested , chat her up and just have fun around her. [9] X Research source “Hey, it’s good to see you again.” “Seems like we have a lot in common. I keep seeing you around.” Remember—a woman is definitely interested in you if she's giving you her time, canceling plans, and making time for you.

steps.title: She’ll want to look her best around you to keep you interested.
steps.content: She’ll want to look her best around you to keep you interested. Some women flaunt their most stylish looks, while others dress a bit sexy. Tell her you like what you see by giving her a compliment . [10] X Research source “You’re glowing tonight.” “Wow, you look great!” “You look hot tonight.”

steps.title: She’ll ask questions and listen intently to your answers because she likes you.
steps.content: She’ll ask questions and listen intently to your answers because she likes you. Tell her a bit about yourself, and then ask her variations of the same questions. She’ll appreciate that you’re taking the time to get to know her. [13] X Research source How to Tell if an Older Woman Likes You “What do you do for fun?” “How are you celebrating the holiday?” “What type of music do you like?” “If you could live anywhere, where would you choose?”

steps.title: She wants to make a real connection with you by sharing more about herself.
steps.content: She wants to make a real connection with you by sharing more about herself. Older women want to connect on a deeper level. She’ll be happy to tell you about her life, her interests, and her past. Be a good listener to show her you care. [12] X Research source Say things like, “Wow,” or “Mmhmm,” to encourage her to keep talking. Make comments about what she says to show you’re paying attention. You might say, “It sounds like work has been stressful lately,” or “Your dog sounds hilarious.”

steps.title: Women love a partner who can make them laugh.
steps.content: Women love a partner who can make them laugh. When a woman likes you, she’ll laugh and laugh at all your jokes—even the ones you know are duds. She’s doing it because she wants you. Show off your sense of humor by keeping the jokes coming. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Older women aren’t shy about telling you what caught their eye.
steps.content: Older women aren’t shy about telling you what caught their eye. She’ll be happy to point out your hot bod or sexy hair. [14] X Research source Make sure she knows you’re interested by returning the favor and giving her a nice compliment . “You have lovely eyes.” “This dress looks amazing on you.” “Your smile is so warm.”

steps.title: An older woman may help you because she’s into you.
steps.content: An older woman may help you because she’s into you. After saying “thank you,” take it a step further and suggest some one-on-one time. [15] X Research source Offer to take her out to say thank you. Hopefully, it’ll lead to a real date. “Why don’t I buy you a coffee to show my appreciation?” “I really appreciate your help. Let me buy you lunch.”

steps.title: She wants you to know she’s hot stuff by bragging about her love life.
steps.content: She wants you to know she’s hot stuff by bragging about her love life. Although older women don’t usually play games, she may try to drop hints that she’s a total catch by bringing up all the people who’ve been flirting with her. She’s hoping to impress you, so show her it worked. [16] X Research source Tell her you can totally see why. “Can you blame them? You look great!” “Anyone would be lucky to have you.” “Is it going to be awkward when I start flirting with you?”
